mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO USER_CONDITION_STATS (STATS_DTTM, PLTFOM_TP_CODE, ADVRTS_PRDT_CODE, MEDIA_SCRIPT_NO, AGE, GENDER, PAR_EPRS_CNT) VALUES
(${I.yyyymmdd}, #{I.platform}, #{I.product}, #{I.scriptNo}, #{I.userAge}, #{I.gender} , #{I.viewCnt3})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE PAR_EPRS_CNT = PAR_EPRS_CNT + VALUES(PAR_EPRS_CNT)

INSERT INTO MOB_ADVER_MEDIA_RETRN_STATS_TMP (STATS_DTTM, PLTFOM_TP_CODE, ADVRTS_PRDT_CODE, ADVRTS_TP_CODE, ADVER_ID, SITE_CODE, MEDIA_SCRIPT_NO, MEDIA_ID, RETRN_CNT, AVAL_CNT) VALUES
(${I.yyyymmdd}, #{I.platform}, #{I.product}, #{I.adGubun}, #{I.advertiserId}, #{I.siteCode}, #{I.scriptNo}, #{I.scriptUserId}, #{I.retrnCnt} , #{I.avalCnt})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE RETRN_CNT = RETRN_CNT + VALUES(RETRN_CNT), AVAL_CNT = AVAL_CNT + VALUES(AVAL_CNT)
